actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 924 of title 18 to increase the penalties for certain offenses relating to firearms, and to provide mandatory minimum penalties in certain circumstances.

summary.text: Increases the penalty for use or carrying of a firearm during commission of a felony. Imposes mandatory minimum sentences for second or subsequent convictions.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 924 of title 18 to increase the penalties for certain offenses relating to firearms, and to provide mandatory minimum penalties in certain circumstances.
